enable_steps.label: You need to set up an E-Mail-Password. Attention: The normal password for the T-Online-Website and Webmail does *not* work for email applications., Sie müssen ein E-Mail-Passwort einrichten. Achtung: Das Passwort für die T-Online-Website und Webmail funktioniert *nicht* für E-Mail-Programme!

Para usar o protocolo IMAP, você deve antes acessar as suas Configurações do webmail UOL, clicar na opção "Ativar IMAP" e então salvar as modificações., To use IMAP, you must log in to webmail, go to "Settings", click "Activate IMAP"
You must allow access via POP3 & IMAP once in the e-mail settings of your account!, Sie müssen einmalig den Zugriff über POP3 & IMAP in den E-Mail-Einstellungen Ihres Kontos erlauben!
Check 'Enable IMAP' on Yandex.Mail setup page
